fields.name: Bumble Bee Coasters
fields.description: Set of 2 or 4 bee honeycomb coasters available for personalisation with a name or phrase such as “Bee Kind” - anything you want! £6 each or £20 for a set of 4

fields.name: Beetlejuice Coasters
fields.description: Resin Beetlejuice coaster set with anti slip rubber domes underneath. Other designs available, please message us for more details. £6 each or £20 for a set of 4.

fields.name: Buffy The Vampire Slayer Trinket Tray
fields.description: Buffy trinket tray with quote “If the Apocalypse Comes, Beep Me” with blue background and black rim. Available in any colour, just pop us a message.

fields.name: Dirty Dancing Trinket Tray
fields.description: Beautifully simple Dirty Dancing inspired trinket tray - perfect for your keys, jewellery, glasses etc.
